Title: Relates to the study of the current prevalence of SNAP/EBT benefit fraud
Summary: Directs the commissioner of social services to study and report on the prevalence and threat of SNAP/EBT benefit fraud.
LawCode: Amd ยง95, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the study of supplemental nutrition assistance program (SNAP) benefit fraud
